--- Simon Chappell <simonpeterchappell@...>
wrote:

> I find that in practice this approach is a pain. The
> log statements
> end up scrolling up the screen and become
> distracting. To my mind a
> unit test run should be silent, reporting only
> errors.

I agree with that. The JUnit result is a kind of
logging. It logs automatically all the information you
really need for your test.

Leave the console clean for really important things
and not for useless noise.
